game.name: Train Simulator: E60 Electric Locomotive Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The massive and powerful General Electric E60 electric, born during the formative years of Amtrak and employed also by NJ TRANSIT, now comes to Train Simulator Classic through the superb creativity of developer Reppo!
game.shortDescriptionEn: The massive and powerful General Electric E60 electric, born during the formative years of Amtrak and employed also by NJ TRANSIT, now comes to Train Simulator Classic through the superb creativity of developer Reppo!
